snippet: The free-pony candidate, Warren Buffet rocking Tom Ford and elective earlobe surgery.
abstract: One Page Magazine offers a profile of actor David Alan Grier, political analysis of the Republicans' predilection for invoking Saul Alinsky's name and tips on how to accept defeat from writer Jonathan Ames. Photos, Charts, Drawings (M)

byline.original: By DAVE ITZKOFF, MATT BAI, BESS LEVIN, ADAM LEFF, RICHARD RUSHFIELD, ERIC SPITZNAGEL, JOHN HODGMAN, GREG VEIS, MARNIE HANEL, WILL SHORTZ, TOM FOLSOM, MAUD NEWTON, DAVID SAX, ELIOT GLAZER, TYLER COWEN, LIZZIE SKURNICK and JONATHAN AMES

lead_paragraph: The Road to Designer Eco-Friendly Grocery Bags By Adam Leff and Richard Rushfield Transcendental Meditation + Jackson Browne = Redwood Hot Tubs + The Jane Fonda Workout = Evian Bottle Shoulder Holsters + Jacques Lacan = Brown University + Enya = Feng Shui Advisers + ''Ally McBeal'' = The Prius + Raw-Food Diet = Farmers' Markets + ''Project Runway'' = Designer Eco-Friendly Grocery Bags THE BIG PROFILE
